descriptionHtml:
Sorry, my native language is not english, so the infos are only very short.

I converted all Recipies to Lorecraft friendly versions.
Books for all Recipies have been created.

Required:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9959]Lorecraft v4.1[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16837]Craftable Panties 2.5[/url]

Load Order:
Both required Masters must be loaded before this mod

Known Bugs/Issues:
- I still need to rework the Prices for the books, but I\'m to lazy atm.
- Everything is pretty generic atm...Function before fancyness :P

credits:
gotha83 for Craftable Panties
ArcaneSmith for Lorecraft
author: RustyXXL
